title: Here Comes The Swamp, Jake Paul = GOAT? 12.2.20
itunes:title: Here Comes The Swamp, Jake Paul = GOAT? 12.2.20
description:
In episode 770, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Grown Local co-host Billy Wayne Davis to discuss Joe Biden's cabinet members, Trump trying to pardon himself, Joe DiGenova threatening Chris Krebs, Jake Paul wanting to fight Conor McGregor, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. The Problem With Putting a BlackRock Alum in Charge of Greening the Economy
  2. Bernie Sanders: 'Enormously insulting' if Biden ignores progressives in his administration
  3. Bernie Sanders' rise forces media to reckon with how to cover him
  4. Sean Hannity Tells Sidney Powell Trump ‘Needs to Pardon His Whole Family and Himself’ Before Leaving Office in January
  5. Rudy Giuliani discussed with Trump the possibility of receiving a preemptive pardon, sources say
  6. After Trump Att’y Calls For His Death, Former DHS Official Warns That He Has Good Lawyers
  7. JAKE PAUL I'M IN TALKS WITH CONOR MCGREGOR'S CAMP ... 'I'm Gonna F**K Him Up'
  8. WATCH: Splash Brothers - Patiently

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
